text: "hondayi dan eyawa maru kala kiyamuko...
api hithanne ee anuwa
eeth pahu pahu wenakota thamayi gahandayi banindayi patan gaththe.
eeta sahabhagi wu mahacharya madagoda abhayathissa himi janapathi maithrita durakathana amathumak dunneya.
thama minipiriya pasal yawamin age wiyapahadam pirimahaganneth pawule dainika wiyadam pirimasa ganneth mema wele¼damen ha gowithanen upaya ganna mudalini.
kawiyata wada amathige eka loku handa
madhyawedinata marana tharjana karana eeniya “rata rakagath deshapremi balakaya” buddhi anshaye athakoluwaki –
oya hari, shrinath ande gunapala jayalath thama..
ape patawu monatharam awasanawantha da? →
oba obata labena sakachja wargaya pilibadawa upakalpanaya nokaranna.
eheth sakachchuawak naththeya.
mulinma pen eka set karanko..
kohoma wunath thamath lankawe hora rahase kukullu kotawana sudu kriyathmaka wenawa kiwwoth piligannawada?
ewakata hitapu nagarika komasaris eekata athsan karala thibenawa.
mawupiyan, du daruwan, swami bharyawan, nada hithamithuran sewya sewakayan aadi lesa api ekinekata bandi sitina bawini.
gampola ambuluwawa kanda riwi rasin dawuneya.
me thiyenne ema jathyanthara sanketha.
shri lankawata pamina wadi dawasak gatha wannata pera selwarachta siya rakiyawa apriya wannata wiya.
ithin api aarakshaka kawunsile raswimak thiyana welawata gahuwanam mandireta, ethakota kawuruth mukuth kiyanne naha.
eth ee katha kale handun kuru gana ehema nama newi kiyala ammata theruna.
´´idin bamuna, waishya kulikayekda, gihigen nikma sasnehi pawidiweda, hethemeda thathagathayan pawasu dharma winayata pamina sathun marimen wenwuye we.
antita kanna enna shift eka maru karanna oone.."
mema samagam danata ka්riyakari sancharaka wyaparaye yedena athara, me athara tharu 5 hotalayak da, tharu 4 hotalayak da wana bawayi.
charithra warithra awathum pawathum sirith - wirith indum hitum me siyallama apata beda hadaganna puluwan.
ape rate thiyena de gana thama amaruwa thiyenne.
niyama bhawanawa awasan wenne niwan dakimen thama.
obathuma loku deyak kale obe uthsahaya saha mahansiya apathe nogiya bawa indurama kiwa hakiyi . ..
awurudu 7 di daruwa pasal yawanna - brithanya adhya...
namuth, ee dakwa siyalu watup wardhaka ha usaswim akhandawa labu bawa kotakadeniya wisin aarakshaka amathyanshayata danwimen pasuwa owun ema prayathnaya hakulagathha.
sarla wunath kamathiyi neda e widiyata inna.
sinhala samajayeth shri lanka rajyayeth me deshapalana namyashilithwayata sinhala bauddha uddachcha satakapatakam aaru kale mahinda chnthanayayi.
eheth thihagoda polisiya athadanguwata gath gini awiya rasa parikshakawarayata idiripath kirimen pasuwa da heliwi aththe deniyaye wedi thabimata yodagena aththe ema gini awiyama bawaya.
ethakota ithin manthumata wayasa..hmmm..ow ethakota mata daha atakata withara athi...

mema kotasa wanahi, 55 kimi-digu (34 satha-digu) kulu kandak wana athara, batahirin kali gandaki doruwa wethinda, uthurin ha nagenahirin mashyangdi gangawenda, dakunin pokara nimnaya wethinda mayim weyi.
kiyaddi nam kage kageth katata kela unanawa.
eheth ayata ese kiyannata kiya dunne yasawathi bawa asima mata menma loku ayiyatada pudumayak danawannata atha.
karyabahula nowana dinayak pri shut eka sandaha yoda ganna dinaya chayarupa shilpiyata menma nawa yuwalata pahasu dinayak wiya yuthuyi.

kolambaa lassana karanawa kiya hamudawa yodagena mahath prodawak kala amarikan purawasi gotabhaya rajapaksha wisin ema blumandal kunu kanda eeta kilomitar dekak pamana aathin wu mithotamullata gena giyeya.
pera paridima widuhalpathiniyata paminili labini.
ganja gana issara samaje thibbe echcharama honda piliganimak nemeyi.
kamaran janadhipathi gawata awidagena enne (kareka gawata ( ohu janadhipathi sirisena thamanta wada uda thanaka dala thiyenne ) eka nisa .
mahath apahasuthawanta lak we.eheth api hamo ma pahe madhya mangin pracharaya karanu labana noyek rasakaraka piri wichchurana aaharawalata giju wi aththemu.
"oya tharam sankirna upakaranayak ayi kawuru hari mage kamaraye sawi kale...?"
-	danata peradeniye lanka wishwawidyagalayiya pusthakalayehi athi, an.bi. pi. gunathilaka dosthara mahathata ayath wa thibu rajawali puskola poth.
mama sujatha ekka set wela ara pissu hutan bariwelawath waha ehema bila malanan mage jiwitha kalayama mama windawayi.mama eekayi ara ammandita nokiya kiyanna haduwe."
hitha honda kollekya....
ithin, wassan wa jah, kiyala elawana, how kiyala nawaththana ayuru kawadawath daka naha duwani.
ape jiwitha athuleth api eka ramuwakata hira wela.
chithrapatiyakata puluwan godak de 'chenj' karanna.
me kawi nam loweth nathi kawi tikakne..
widyuth thapala ho lipiyak mangin pusthakala samajikathwaya ikuth wi athi bawa ho ragena yana pothaka aapasu bhara dime dinaya ikuth wi athi bawa danum dimak sidu karanu labe.
piyawi asin pahasuwen daka ganimata haki tharamata pleyades dipthimath bawa pasugiya sathiye (nowambara 4da) pala wu lipiyehi api sandahan kalemu.

kilo gram 120 bara panthiya yatathe tharaga wadunu ransilu jayathilaka skot kramayata kilo gram 285k osawaminda, dedlift kramayata kilo gram 315k osawaminda ran padakkam dina gath athara, samastha tharagaye kilo gram 735k osawamin ema bara panthiye samastha ran padakkamada dina ganimata samathwi thibe.
diwinasa ganima uthkarshayata nanwima hela dakiya yuthu bawath no esenam, eya sadacharathmakawa abhiyogayata lakwiya yuthu bawath pradeshiya manthriwarayek wana fil wilis ge mathaya wiya.
thamanta kiyala depala ayithiyak thiyagannatath, ee depala agaya wadi kara gannatath hakiyawa athi palath saha ratawal walata minissu adila yanawa.
ee kale muhuda witharak goda karan hitiyanan...
mama eya ganan kirimata nogiyemi.
kukuleku aththatu gasanna se, he ath deka diyehi gasa “kukku ku ku...
mema surupi nirupikawa miyami nagaraye jiwath wana athara aya 30 hawiridi wiye pasuwanniya.
‘deshi hithaishi‘ amathya wimal wirasinha da mewara satanata piwisiye ya.
watahenu athayi sithamu.

ema karyaya itukirimedi wiwidha kshethrayanta adala nithimaya karunu pilibadawa danuma ha awabodhayen paripurnawima aparadhakaruwanta daduwam dimatath, windithayinta nithiya idiriye sadharanaya itukirimatath athyawashya karunak.
"mrudubawe, karunawe wiplawayak awashyaya…
rohal karyaya mandalayata wahana nathara kirimata rohal bhumiye sulu idak athath rogiyaku ragena rohalata paminennakuta wahana nathara kirimata ha idakadak natha.
eeth sajitha saha dinara chithrapataya rugatha kirimata masa hatharakata pamana pera sita puhunuwim kala.
losakage mawa ohu amaruwen athidadi kala ya.

ee ithihasaye dethun deneku wisin pamanak sidu kota thibu men ma bahutharayak denekuta sidukirimata awashya wi thibu namuth ese kirimata tharam pita kondak nomathi wu bawin, ewani karyayak kirimata tharam pitakondak thibu ek pirimiyeku wu wika්rama daka balaganime aashawen ojawadawana lada sithaththangen da ese nomathi nam thama swamiya amu amuwe ohuge nila kamaraye di ma wedi thaba molayen iliyata pinu mas wadali ha in galagiya rudhiraya gangawakin rajaye aayathanayak thetha baritha kirimata tharam hithak papuwak nothibu ninditha mlechchayeku, adhamayeku husma hirawena thek kambaayakin ella, gata gasa maranayata path kala yuthu yayi yana garu gambhira thinduwa nadukarayage gambauru kata hadin shalawa pura dedarum kanawa siya as walinma balannata ha siya sawan walin ma asa ganimata kamathi wuwangen da yanna pahadili natha.
habayi mahindage kale thibuna abarthu kipayakma thawamath thiyenawa...
ee gana baya wenna epa.”

me wana wita swakiya aramunu mudunpath kara ganimin idiriyata adena -papadi 2013 yathrawe sampurna gaman margaya aawaranaya karamin dina 10 purawatama yathra karannata niyamitha tharuna tharuniyan 25 dena eki kalaya mulullema yoga abhyasa, bhawana, sangithaya yanadiyehi itha suwisheshi aakarayen parisaraya ha adhyathmaya eekathmika wana lesa yedawimen owun parisaraya surakima pilibandawa samajayata labadena paniwidaya hudekma kruthrima pracharanayak nowa apa dara sitina mihi mathawa wenuwen hrudayangama wu aadarayen nagena handak lesa mahajanayata samipa karawima apeksha kere.
galla disthrikkayata ayath alpitiye indan sathapum 12k withara durin thiyena me aaranya senasanaya aarambha kara thiyenne 1953 di.
labena padiyen kala bila adiyak gahala rasthiyaduwak dala inna man maha gananak ithiri karapu ekek neweyi kiyala..
kata waharehi ena...
*2013 wesak masa 17wanada*
elesinma 1 korenthi 15:1-9 dakwa sandahan wanna wu kotase shuddha wu pawulthuma jesus wahansege uththana wima pilibadawa katha karayi.
nowa janapadayata apiwa ooni.
ithin api ahanne me rate upadhidhariyata dena abhyasaya mekada ?
katholika pujakawarun wisin lingika apacharayata lak karana lada ayagen saha owunge pawulwalin "mama bahapathwa samawa illa sitimi"yi sudothum pransis papwahanse prakasha karathi.
kese wethath me chithrapatiya shri lankawe pradarshanaya kalahoth, hudu lingika darshana narambaimen kamuka thrupthiyak balaporoththu wannangen, sinamahala pirena bawa nam kiwa hakiya.
eltitiee sanwidhanaya yudamaya washayen parajaya kota wasara hayak gatha wi thibe.
eda athithaye thibuna pawul parisaraya apata nawatha hadanna bariwenna puluwan.
“yam se wanahi samahara pinwath mahanabamuno sadahayen dun bojun walanda, diksangala putu ya.
pahalin thiyenawa me wage thawath nogalapena
ee prakasha nithiyata anukulada?
pasugiya okthobar 26 wenida wenakota janathawa hitiye wishala pidanayakin.
habayi meke sampurna gaurawaya yanna one ape kod |
aththata ma eeye ra ee wage siddhiyak dakka.......
mu pendekne ban....
marwals eejants of shild katha malawe dewana katha samaye atawana kotasayi me aragena enne.
ayata manasika rogayak thibunada nadda yanna kimata mama nodanimi.
pulun kaballak thel wala pongawagena, innan matha aalepa kara sambahanaya karanna.
ekamath eka ratak thibuneya.
mal mitak thiyan - kasun kalhara
kasada badilla kese wethath.."
othana oya kaduwak dala thiyenne wenath deyak adahas karanta.
me kawuruth pahe ekata nathath yana ena thanak thiyenawa.
ane ee ahinskaya dannawa nam mewa...
kiri­kodu hambu thamange yahalu yehe­li­yan samanga waw pitiye duwa pana awida giye nida­has sitha­kin.
ee wenuwen adhishtana sahagathawa kapawiya yuthu bawayi aga්ramathyawaraya wadiduratath kiya sitiye.
ee awasthawa salaka bala sadharanaya itu kala yuththe adhikaranaya wisini.
mama bila thiyenawa eth matanam kisima deyak danune naha.
ee kiyanne panak nasana kenata bhikshuthwaya ahimi wenawa...
thawa monawa asthawara wennada.
bhandagarayen awashya sahana labadila angalum karmanthaya shakthimath kara emangin jiwath wana laksha sankhyatha tharuna tharuniyan ge rakiya sthira kala.*
wahi walawa enawa danenakota malu sathuten uda paninawa"

indiyanu samajaya ha madhya ෙkashthraya gana neth yoma sitina mata penenne aawegashili nowi prathipaththimaya ha tharkika padanamakin prashna wigraha kirime hakiyawa anna hasareta wada arundathi royita wadi bawayi.
oya kade yana yamata nam aniwa oyin berunoth athi..
thawath amarikanuwan ha amarikawe sitina wideshikayin wishala pirisak prantha rajayange aramudal walin aahara sahanadharaya labagannata atha.

kambaurupitiye api sanwidhanaya meheyawu mathara disthrik palath palana aayathana athara sahallu pandu krikat tharagawaliye jaya waligama pradeshiya sabhawata himiwiya.kambaurupitiya narandeniya jathika pasal kridanganayedi pawathi tharagawaliyata samagamiwa yauwana katayuthu saha nipunatha sanwardhana amathya dalas alahapperuma mahathage nayakathwayen yuth krikat kandayama pradarshana krikat tharagayakatada ekwiya.tharagawaliye sahathika ha thyaga pradanayada amathi dalas alahapperuma mahatha athin sidu kerini..
mewa me tharam loku mahath karanna api ganne loku mahansiyak.
eheth aduradarshi kriyamarga hethuwen ayawaya eekagrathawaya da arbudayata lakwanu atha.
eeta kalin bodubala senawe gnyanasara himiyan naduwaka sakshikaruwanta tharjanaya kele ya yana chodanawata waradakaru wuna.
manawa himikam komishama wisin nikuth karana lada prakashaya pahatha palawe.
“awurudu pahe dariyage thaththa thamayi, ee daruwa dushanaya karala thiyenne.
liyawille eya mathuwenawa nam , oba kiyana de piligannam .
ane kale wane wase kiwwalu.
jiwithaye palamu wathawata (ha samaharawita awasana wathawata – anarakshitha muhudu gamana etharamma wadayaki.)
awama washayen paya 8ka wath nindak laba ganna.
kinam kriyadamayakin ho yamekuge diwi thora kirimen apata athwiya haki iranama pilibandawa apa manawa danuwath wiya yuthuyi.
me rate samanya madhyama panthika janathawa ya.
hih danuyi therune..
warjanaya pilibanda madhyayata thorathuru danum dunnada departhamenthuwa danuwath kara nomathi bawin ee sambandhayen nila pa්rakashayak sidukala nohaki bawada ohu kiyasitiya.
badu giwisumak nomathi wima hethuwen thrikunamalaye thel tanki rajayata yali pawara gannayi merata parlimenthuwe kop kamituwa wisin nirdesha kara thibe.
me nisa kenek kettu nam mulinma panpiti walin 100% k duras wiya yuthuyi. mema thathwaya rogayak lesata wigraha kalath eya glutan nisa athiwu thathwayak.
eewa pahalowakwath aniwaryayen pasu kala yuthu we.
the kola wada samathulitha we.

anthime mage ma pamula danin wati mama- kiyam mage duka mata ma hada kiyala hitan andonawa patan gaththa.
anthime sangitha sandarshanayak danawa pradeshaye deshapalakayage gane.
wasthuwa siraswa, enam hari kelin udata wisikaloth, prakshepanaya kaloth, eya siraswa udata gos nawatha aapasu enawa.

ethana atawapu maduwa wateta kalekuth wawilalu.
ehi me kiyana nyashtika awi ha samana awiyak yoda gath bawatath pawasenawa.
paya ganak wathure nataddi matayi mage yaluwo set ekatayi karanna athi tharam sellam thibuna.
ee kiyanne metrik ton delaksha dahadahak parisarayata ekathu wenawa.
naggath hamadama bas eka udeta ayithi karagaththa kattiyak innawa.
mehe thiyanawa ehema dan.
mama dakka kawudo anagathaya diwasin balana kenek kiyala thiyanawa karu jayasuriya mahaththaya aapahu kawadawath amathi kamak labanne na kiyala...
ee minissu eka darshanayak balala marenakan ee natyaya yali yalith sihipath karamin windanayak labayi.
mariya won trap kiyanneth sangithamaya charithayak.
me raj thirikkalenda manda aawe?
manasa saha wishwaya dekama sambandha wana mema bola wala balaya anuwa wiwidha kriyakarakam sadaha bhawitha kalahakiya.
eelangata namalta mehi sanwidhana katayuthu pawaruni.
thalamala pipila walin patan gena guru tharuwa, lokaya thani yayak, andarela haraha awith sudu redi horu walin awasan wuna.
prawina pirisa nawaka pirisata dakwana sahayogaya gana sathutu wenna puluwanda?
wenath bhawitha sandaha, anduru padarthaya (wakroththiharanaya) balanna anduru padarthaya adrrushya weyi.
meya niyatha agayak.
nona ape punchi ratawalwalata leda dana hilari wath oya bhawana madhyasthanayata geniyanna plis pinsiduweyi.

eya yahapath lakunaki.dakunu atha ha wam athame dinawala pawathwena jiniwa manawa himikam kawunsila 26wani sasiwarayedi ehi sitina lankawe nithya niyojitha rawinatha aaryasinha 10wanida kawunsilayata pawasuwe lankawa jiniwa wimarshanayata kisiseth sahayogaya nodakwana bawath, ema wimarshanaya eksath jathinge piligath muladharmawalata ha jathyanthara nithiyata patahani bawathya.
obe kathawen oba kala wihilu sahagatha karunu dakwima mangin obe hasirima kesewath sadharanikaranaya wanne da nomatha.
ada kale me ayata illuwa wadiyi kiyalayi minissu kiyanne.

me anuwa penenne apa no sithana karunu sandaha da wayu dushakawala balapamak athi bawa ya. 2010 deshaguna tharagakarithwa darshakaya gatha wu desambar masaye di pawathi deshaguna wenas wima walakwima pilibanda sakachcha paladayaka no wu bawath me wana wita deshaguna sakachcha tharamak anahita athi bawath prakata karunaki.

labha ipayima wadi kirima.
owun ma ehi gena giye yanayakin nowe.
siyalu sathwayo niduk wethwa !

1947sita adawana thek pitasakwala yana gananawak kadawatunu bawath, ema yanawalin thakshanaya batahira ratawal, wisheshayenma amerikawata labunu bawath emagin amerikawe thakshanika nimwalalu pulul pululwunu bawath, dewana loka yuddhayen pasu amerikawa thakshana balawatha wimata mema thakshanaya iwahal wunu bawath pawasenawa.
owun samaga me mathiwaranaya ee palathwala pawathwimata siyallama sudanam kara awasan.
mema idikirim samanyayen gimhana-wasantha madili sandaha bhawitha dwithwa ech wanija mandalaya , adu ushnathwaya nida mallak sandaha bhawitha wadath janapriya wana.
eka eka tiyub, bothal, wage na na prakara dewal.
ee dekama suwisheshi awasthaya.
mema wyapruthiye siwil injinerumaya idikirima sandaha konthrath pirinamima ru.
'me aakarayata katayuthu kala kathanayakawarayata erehiwa wishwasabhanga yojanawak genna oona.

thamange adhikari balaya yatathe himiwa athi balaya prakarawa mahinda rajapaksha yanu janadhipathiwaranaya thula sitina thawath ek apekshakayeku bawa ohuta sihipath karana lesa apa mathiwarana komasariswarayagen illa sitinnemu.
ee wunata me thiyari karayingen bohomayaka mathiwarana samaye deshapalana bhawithaya harima saralayi.
rathriya elambaena thek iwasa sita owun hathara dena aathata gena gos damimata sinnyappu adahas kele ya.
ehi giya apata dakagatha hakiwuye udasanama ehi pamina siti rogihuya.
sellam na samo ....
hudek pansil samadan wim mathrayenma ee kusalaya thama maranasanna sithata aramunu wima nisa sugathigami wime bhagyaya me damila doratu palakayata uda wuyeya.
nam eeka thama jayagrahanaya.
ee paththe gewal peliya wasennata tapolin reddak digata ada payippa bata gasa thibuneya.
wade hari parana ariyas ehemath kawar karagena mama wade maha ihalinma itu karala..
inda hita papadi nawathwana polisiye nila darawan papadi layisankara athida, papadiye pawathiya yuthu upakarana nisilesa sawikara athida kiya parikshakara balayi.
hamadama api ahanna aasa sigiri sinnyoge katha.
meyin ithama sundara dasun mawenawa.

ee wagema thamayi ma samaga ekwi sitina aadaraniya janathawa mewara hamibanthota disthrik manapa layisthuwe anka ekata mawa mbaasawa thabana bawa mata saksudak se wishwasayi.”amathiwaraya mema adahas dakwuye katawuna di pawathi yowun balamulu samimeilanaya amathaminya.
kandiyaneekama thamayi math nokiya kiyanne.
hitha ganna bari tharamata lassanayi...,

apita podi kaledi iskolen kiyala dila thiyenne eewa hondata hodala bhawitha karana lesaya.mama nan ehemaya.mokada ithin api honda kollo ya.namuth anith ewun gan nan mata suwar natha.mewa kata kiyannada kiyala nothereyi mata.namuth dan dan me watina papadama apen aෑthwigena yana bawa norahasaki.wisheshayen kollo atharin ya.kello athara mema yata papadama kohoma janapriya wi aැthdayi mama nodanimi.namuth mata nan hithenne mema watina papadama wadi wegayakin aෑthwigena yanne ganu lamayin geni.mokada kiwwoth dan dan owun andina papadam wala podu sadhaka kapi yana thanata pathwi aැtha.ewita anthimatama ithuru wanne yata papadama ya.inpasu eyada kapi yanu aැtha.mewa rajaya wisin soya baliya yuthu jathyanthara gatalu ya.
